summary: He criticized it as early as 2010.

checks.short: He criticized it as early as 2010.
checks.name: The New York Times

checks.quote: However, back in 2010, he told Fox News anchor Brian Kilmeade that WikiLeaks was “disgraceful” and suggested that “there should be a death penalty or something” for what WikiLeaks has done.
checks.name: Gizmodo

title: Trump Hadn't Heard of Wikileaks Before 2016 Campaign
